name: WannaMine
description: WannaMine - In this game you have to control the virus so he could get around the firewall of computer "firewall" and get directly to the CPU! A winding path makes the game fun and not easy.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: Athlon 2 X3 450 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce EN9600 GT Storage: 50 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: AMD fx6300 Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce EN9800 GT Storage: 100 MB available space
